step.sql: SELECT P.* FROM M_PARAMETER P WHERE NAME IN ('DATA_VERSION','GLM_VERSION','LANG_CODE','REGION_INFO','COORDINATE_SYS','COORDINATE_UNIT','XY_PRECISION','Z_PRECISION','ADAS_PARA');
DELETE FROM M_PARAMETER P WHERE NAME IN ('DATA_VERSION','GLM_VERSION','LANG_CODE','REGION_INFO','COORDINATE_SYS','COORDINATE_UNIT','XY_PRECISION','Z_PRECISION','ADAS_PARA');
